page.title: 20TRADE
page.content:
New shops have been built in{ {Wath }selling a wide variety of goods. There are about 13 {pubs} in Wath and six in Brampton/West Melton including two recently converted from existing dwellings: Church House in Wath and the Manor House in Brampton and the newly built {Sandygate Hotel. Wath {Market }is held on Wednesdays. It has 31 stalls selling fruit, flowers, vegetables, household goods, petfoods and clothes. The market is set out in four rows of neat and attractive stalls. It is always very busy so the stall holders set up early. They come from other parts of Yorkshire: Dewsbury, Wakefield, Doncaster and Barnsley.Two(garages)in the area sell a large number of new and second hand cars:{D.C.Cook }and {Hayselden's. }
{ }
